PI_name.0: V. Angelopoulos, A. Roux and O. LeContel

TEXT.0: THEMIS-B: Search Coil Magnetometer (SCM) Magnetic Field Measurements. Includes FAST SURVEY, PARTICLE BURST and WAVE BURST data. FAST SURVEY (SCF): 1/8 second time resolution. PARTICLE BURST (SCP): 1/128 second time resolution; only short bursts of data. WAVE BURST (SCW): 1/8192 second time resolution; only short bursts of data. Sensor and electronics design provided by LPP, Roux and Le Contel

LINK_TITLE.0: Instrument description including data modes, products and caveats

LINK_TITLE.1: Processing history and the THEMIS mission website including TDAS s/w

Validate.0: Compatible with the ISTP CDF Standards
